page.title: 16Oaker Nurseries, Gt.Yeldham.
page.content: Oaker nurseries was founded in 1958.It is a private family business run by E.W.& A.Fisher.They are the largest growers of bedding plants in the United Kingdom.In a 4-month period, they produce 80,000 trays of plants which are supplied to supermarkets, garden centres,etc.It was the first nursery in the country to use E-V-A sheeting,a new strong plastic material which retains infra red heat for longer periods of time.In the busy season, the nursery employs up to 27 workers.The family owns four & a quarter acres of land. Two & a half acres are under glass. Watering, heating & ventilation are all controlled automatically.It can cost up to Â£100 a night for heating in the cold weather. About 250 different varieties of annual flowering plants are grown.The most popular is Lobelia.
